name: Gith
description: The Gith are a race of tall, gaunt humanoids with a history of enslavement by mind flayers. Divided into two factions, the martial Githyanki and the contemplative Githzerai, they possess powerful psionic abilities. Both factions are fierce and dedicated to their respective causes, often clashing with each other.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Gith.
special: Psionics: You know the *Mage Hand* cantrip, and you can cast it without verbal or material components. Depending on your subrace, you gain additional psionic abilities.
